snippet: The mezzo-soprano Sasha Cooke performed love songs inspired by poetry during the Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center’s concert at Alice Tully Hall on Friday evening.
lead_paragraph: The mezzo-soprano Sasha Cooke performed love songs inspired by poetry during the Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center’s concert at Alice Tully Hall on Friday evening.
